text: In the 2011–12 season, JSM Béjaïa is competing in the Ligue 1 for the 12th season, as well as the Algerian Cup. They will be competing in Ligue 1, the Algerian Cup and the Champions League. ==Squad list== Players and squad numbers last updated on 18 November 2011. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
